desc: We offer artisan accessories handmade in Bella Coola, British Columbia, Canada. We specialize in polymer clay jewelry with new items being created all the time. We love shopping local and small business and we hope you do too. All of our products are unique just like you. Subscribe or check us out on Instagram!

layout.text: All of our earrings are carefully handmade and each one unique so you can show everyone your style and your story.
